ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: Getting thse things would be a result of hacking not twinking. the thorny vine armor is plane of fear and i think no drop. the pegasus claok is no drop too.
ygData.messageBody:
Getting thse things would be a result of hacking not twinking. the thorny
vine armor is plane of fear and i think no drop. the pegasus claok is no
drop too.

Trevalien


>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?
>Date: Fri, 27 Aug 1999 10:50:41 PDT
>
>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>
>
>
>>From: Douglas Taylor <douglas@...>
>>Heh - you might see that anyway. Last night I saw a level 10 wizard in
>>a flowing black robe, shimmering orb, and one of those skull staves
>>running from an orc centurion in the E. Commonlands.
>>
>>--
>>We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
>>with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
>>of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
>>
>
>I'm afraid he's correct. Twinking is at an all time how now. The "player
>run
>economy" is all but non existant. Everything's falling apart. And now
>people
>are getting bored and are starting to hack at EQ. What's next? Let me
>guess.
>Verant's going to release a patch that allows the sky to fall. But it'll
>fix
>EVERYTHING as usual. >8)
>
